values: Our Worth Is Not in What We Own: Fifteen-Minute Gospel PresentationOur Worth Is Not in What We Own: Fifteen-Minute Gospel Presentation

We will never find true worth in what we have or who we are. True, full, lasting satisfaction can only come through all that God is for us in Jesus Christ. After the congregation sang “My Worth Is Not in What I Own,” John Piper presented this gospel message at the Sing! Belfast conference.We will never find true worth in what we have or who we are.
